Suffolk Libraries

Help

Home → Help using the service → Suggest a title

Suggest a title

Suggest a book, film or music for us to stock.

Have you searched our catalogue first? We may well have the title already.

We act on most suggestions, but cannot guarantee to purchase every title.

We'll get back to you with a decision as soon as possible.

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
